comments.text:
Set up the Korporus monorepo with pnpm workspaces and the initial directory structure:

```
korporus/
├── apps/
│   ├── shell/              (Epic 2)
│   ├── demo-angular/       (Epic 4)
│   └── demo-react/         (Epic 4)
├── packages/
│   ├── app-hello/          (Epic 3)
│   ├── app-manifest/       (Epic 1)
│   └── web-component-wrapper/  (Epic 1)
├── infra/                  (Epic 5)
├── Dockerfile              (Epic 5)
├── pnpm-workspace.yaml
├── tsconfig.base.json
└── README.md
```

Configure TypeScript with a shared base config. Set up linting (ESLint + Prettier). Add a root README.md explaining the project structure and how to run things locally.

### Acceptance Criteria
- `pnpm install` succeeds from the root.
- Each workspace package can import from sibling packages.
- TypeScript builds pass with strict mode enabled.

### Dependencies
None (first step).
